parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Firestone Steeltex Radial R4S Tire Failure
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The sudden failure of the Firestone Steeltex Radial R4S tires can cause loss of control, accidents, and potentially result in injuries or fatalities.
symptoms: Tire tread separation
blowouts
and cracks on the inside of the tire
not visible from the outside.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the electrical system can cause a burning smell, loss of power, and electrical shocks, which can lead to accidents, fires, or injuries.
symptoms: Strong burning smell in the vehicle
melted plastic near the exhaust system
electrical problems with the refrigerator
generator
and other electrical components
loss of power when plugged into a campground
burning odor that requires frequent stops to clear.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the battery can cause electrical system failures, leading to accidents, fires, or injuries.
symptoms: Battery burnout
replacement of multiple batteries (auxiliary and engine)
electrical problems with the generator and other electrical components.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the generator can cause electrical system failures, leading to accidents, fires, or injuries.
symptoms: Electrical problems with the generator
burning odor
loss of power when plugged into a campground
frequent repairs and replacements.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Lack of Disclosure of Recall Information
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure to disclose recall information can lead to unaware vehicle owners continuing to operate vehicles with known safety defects, increasing the risk of accidents or injuries.
symptoms: Vehicle owner was not informed of recall 00V104 regarding the faulty emergency spare tire.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Inadequate Attachment of Motorhome Cab-Over Portion
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The inadequate attachment of the motorhome cab-over portion can cause water ingress, leading to electrical issues, corrosion, and potentially even detachment of the cab-over portion while driving, which can result in accidents or serious safety hazards.
symptoms: Screws attaching the cab-over portion to the Ford cab are loose or have fallen out
allowing water to enter the cab area
and potentially causing the cab-over portion to detach while driving.
